method.name: create_bone
method.description: Creates a bone that doesn't already exist.

method.name: from_animation
method.description: Turns a godot animation into an EPAS pose data object

method.name: set_bone_position
method.description: Sets the position of a bone. [b]Note:[/b] The bone must exist. Create it with [method create_bone] if needed.

method.name: set_bone_rotation
method.description: Sets the rotation of a bone. [b]Note:[/b] The bone must exist. Create it with [method create_bone] if needed.

method.name: set_bone_scale
method.description: Sets the scale of a bone. [b]Note:[/b] The bone must exist. Create it with [method create_bone] if needed.
